webflow.title: Blog Template
webflow.description: A simple blog application that allows a single organization to manage and post blog posts.

post.description: Stores blog posts with a title, content, and published status.

create.description: Creates a new blog post. Only available to signed-in users.

update.description: Updates an existing blog post. Only available to signed-in users who own the post.

signUp.description: Allows new users to create an account using email/password or Google.

api/models/post/author.gelly.description: A computed field that retrieves the author's details for a post.

post.description: Signed-in users can create posts, and update/delete their own posts.

web/routes/_app.post.($id).tsx.description: Allows users to create and edit blog posts using a rich text editor.

web/routes/_public._index.tsx.description: Displays a list of published blog posts to all visitors.
